name: Trash Island (Nunu_Shonnashi, oldbomb)
description:
Trash Island is a 2D narrative game based on a girl who lives on an island made of trash and must find out what happened by exploring the events near her. The game will be set in a 2d side-scrolling world where the player will progress through a linear story of helping wildlife and the environment facing devastation which will lead her to finding out where the trash is coming from. This is a very compact narrative experience where we want the player to become aware of the garbage economy and its effects on the planet

Contributing members:-

Seb Heinrich - One_player_mode/oldbomb
